title: The Lunar New Years Special: Part 1
itunes:title: The Lunar New Years Special: Part 1
description:
In part 1 of our special Lunar New Years episode Chris is joined by JN, a member of the Lausan Collective, and Jane Shi, a poet, writer, and organizer to discuss organizing in the Chinese diaspora, the deployment of anti-Asian violence by reactionaries to strengthen the police against Black and Indigenous people, and our favorite Chinese New Years foods

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In part 1 of our special Lunar New Years episode Chris is joined by JN, a member of the Lausan Collective, and Jane Shi, a poet, writer, and organizer to discuss organizing in the Chinese diaspora, the deployment of anti-Asian violence by reactionaries to strengthen the police against Black and Indigenous people, and our favorite Chinese New Years foods
